page.title: 07MARFLEET LANE SHOPS, HULL
page.content: {Survey of 2 shopping parades- {****First (430-444) MARFLEET LANE**** {J&P Bridgeman(430)}Wholesale & retail tobacconnist.Cigarettes,sweets,ices & drinks.Open 7 days a week.Has 2 Space Invaders which teenagers play on.{ {Colleens(430)}Hairdresser.Styling Â£1. Adults trim Â£1.Perms from Â£6.Ear piercing.{William Hill(432)}Betting Shop{General Store(434)}Open 7 days a week.Cooked meats,groceries,cigarettes {Marfleet Curry House(436)}Chinese Take Away.Open every night.{Beals(438)} Newsagent.Open every day.}Toys(Action Force),sweets,crisps {Rex Laundrette {(440)}Open 7 days a week.Assistants do peoples washing for a service charge { {Ashe & Nephew (442)}Off Licence { {Wrights Fisheries(444)}Fish & Chips Open Mon to Sat(Except Sat Evening) { {"These shops are small and limited as {to what they stock.Prices are a little
